mapper.select: SELECT r.accom_name AS accomName, r.start_date AS startDate, r.end_date AS endDate, r.seats AS seats FROM accom_reservation r WHERE r.mem_code = #{memCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO accom_reservation (mem_code, accom_code, accom_name, start_date, end_date, seats) VALUES (#{memCode}, #{accomCode}, #{accomName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{seats})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM accom_reservation WHERE reservation_id = #{reservationId} AND mem_code = #{memCode}
